title: Grateful Dead Live at Roanoke Civic Center on 1987-07-08
lineage: The Master Cassettes were played back with Azimuth adjustment and Dolby Decoded on a Nakamichi CD1 into a Korg MR1000 at DSF 1 bit 5.6MHz. Subsequent conversion to 24/96 AIFF done via Korg Audiogate software. Redbook CDR standard 16/44.1 files were created using Bias Peak, Izotope Ozone's MBIT+ (for all dithering), and Weiss Saracon SRC (all sample rate conversions). FLAC'd using Audiofile Engineering Sample Manager.
source: 2 Nakamichi CM100s/CP4>Sony TCD5M w/Dolby Maxell MX90s cassettes. 5th row behind Board, DFC (Sec LT5 Row E Seat 5)
